Projects

I have worked on a number of exciting projects!

Autonomous Wheelchair

A wheelchair that can be directed using only your eyes

  • Explore

Gazetracker

A tool that can track which pixels you are looking at on a screen with a high level of accuracy

Konstruct

A set of tools created for Unity 3D to create large diverse datasets in a simulated environment.

  • Explore

Smart Vent

An iteration upon the nest thermostat which allows you to fine tune the temperature of your house on a room by room basis

  • Explore

StreamSurf

A computer vision tool for conducting hydrology surveys.

  • Explore

Rouge Squadron

For my computer graphics course, I recreated elements of one of my favorite childhood videogames using OpenGL

  • Explore
